```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(ggplot2)

covid<-read_csv("Datasets/US_Covid_Cases.csv")
covid
covid$Date<-as.Date(covid$Date, "%m/%d/%y")


mostRecent = covid[ which(covid$Date == '2020-12-03'),1:3]

covidAnalysis <- read_csv('covidAnalysis.csv')

covidAnalysis

plot(covidAnalysis$infection_rate, covidAnalysis$Q2_GDP)

model = lm(covidAnalysis$infection_rate~covidAnalysis$Q2_GDP)

residual = resid(model)

plot(covidAnalysis$infection_rate, residual); abline(0,0)

cov(covidAnalysis$infection_rate, covidAnalysis$Q2_GDP)
cov(covidAnalysis$infection_rate, covidAnalysis$Q1_GDP)

cor(covidAnalysis$infection_rate, covidAnalysis$Q2_GDP)
cor(covidAnalysis$infection_rate, covidAnalysis$Q1_GDP)

pairs(covidAnalysis[ , 4:6 ])
```
